resources.string: I agree to send a message to register, and the fees will charged by carriers.
“Find the phone” can help you locate or lock your phone, and remotely erase all data from your phone. You can find your lost phone on zhao.lenovomm.com.

When the phone is lost, a SMS command can be sent via the emergency contact number to receive a text message on the change of cards. We recommend that you enter a family member or friend’s mobile number.
After this is enabled, you will need to enter a PIN to use your phone. This prevents your SIM card from being misused when you phone is lost.
"Send a text message via the emergency contact number to the lost phone for search. The lock instruction: zhao#SD# Positioning instruction: zhao#DW# The alarm sound: zhao#JB#"
[Find the phone](1/3)Your number %1$s has been set as an emergency contact.
[Find the phone](3/3)You can also locate the phone on zhao.lenovomm.com,to locate the position of my phone and lock it remotely.
"[Find the phone](3/3)When the phone is lost, please send one of the following SMSes to the lost phone.nTo Lock the phone：zhao#SD# Remote positioning：zhao#DW# Sound alarm：zhao#JB#"

[Find the phone] Remote locking has been activated and the phone has been permanently locked. If someone picks up your phone, he can call your number %1$s. You can also locate the phone through zhao.lenovomm.com.

[Fine the phone] Remote locking has been activated. The phone’s current location is \"%1$s\", accurate to \"%2$s meters. Currently location at \"%3$s\". To update the position, please send another positioning command. You can also locate the phone through zhao.lenovomm.com.
[Find the phone] Remote alarm has been activated. The alarm on the phone will be sounded for 1 minute to help you locate your lost your phone. You can also locate the phone on zhao.lenovomm.com.
[Find the phone] My phone card has been changed
Password error overrun, account temporarily locked. Please try again after 10 minutes.
You need to set a password for enabling Find the phone
I have lost my phone. If you find it, please contact me! Many Thanks!
